question.name: Question 01
question.text: Plenti is a rewards program that lets members earn points at one place and use them at another, all with a single card.

question.name: Question 2
question.text: To earn 1 Plenti point per $1 spent on eligible products and services on the monthly AT&T wireless bill, customers need to _______ and _______. (Select two)
question.correctans: A. enroll in paperless billing,B. link their Plenti card number via myAT&T
question.choices: A. enroll in paperless billing|B. link their Plenti card number via myAT&T|C. upgrade to Mobile Share Value® 15GB or higher|D. enroll in autopay with a checking or savings account

question.name: Question 3
question.text: Updates on ways to earn Plenti points at AT&T can be found at _____.\r(Select all that apply)
question.correctans: A. plenti.com,B. Plenti mobile app,C. myCSP
question.choices: A. plenti.com|B. Plenti mobile app|C. myCSP|D. OPUS Mobile

question.name: Question 4
question.text: When customers link their Plenti card number via myAT&T it’s visible in _____ and _____. (Select two)
question.choices: A. OPUS Mobile|B. FAN Search Tool|C. Customer Snapshot|D. Customer Service Summary (CSS)

question.name: Question 5
question.text: AT&T point activity can be viewed from _____. (Select all that apply)
question.correctans: A. Customer Snapshot,C. plenti.com,D. Plenti mobile app
question.choices: A. Customer Snapshot|B. OPUS Mobile|C. plenti.com|D. Plenti mobile app
